channel.title: The teleports wont work

item.title: The teleports wont work
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

After i change the EXP RATES , normal magic teleports ddnt work â€¦ any suggestions ?

[code] double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

   	double TotalExp = 0;
      if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
        TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
      } else if (FightType != 3) {
        TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
      } else {
        TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
      }
      TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff);
      TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
      addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

double TotalExp = 0;
if (!UseBow)
animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1200;
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 0) {
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(1000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7; [/code]
